conversations.body_text:
I just need to cancel the order for this steering wheel.

Thanks

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 9:58 AM William Mac <william.mac1990@gmail.com>
wrote:

> hello, is it possible to just cancel this order?
>
> Thanks
>
>
Hi William Mac,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your order has already been shipped, and I will do my best to intercept it for you.

If possible, you can cancel the whole order. I didn’t know it was coming
from china with tariffs. I thought it was shipping from US.

Thanks

William Mac
*Data Scientist/Consultant/Engineer*
Cell: (909)272-6728
Email: william.mac1990@gmail.com


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 3:45 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi William Mac,    We apologize for the delayed response. Unfortunately, your order interception was unsuccessful.  However, rest assured there will be no customs duties. Please note that delivery times may be slightly longer compared to shipments originating from our U.S. warehouse.

Sounds good. Thanks.


William Mac
*Data Scientist/Consultant/Engineer*
Cell: (909)272-6728
Email: william.mac1990@gmail.com


On Thu, Dec 18, 2025 at 3:20 AM service@simsonn.com
